title: Court directs Imaan Mazari, Hadi Chatha to submit reply in controversial tweet case by Oct 11
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 7 (APP):The District & Sessions Court of Islamabad on Tuesday directed Imaan Mazari and Hadi Ali Chatha to submit their written replies on the charge sheet in the controversial tweet case by the next hearing on October 11.
Additional District and Sessions Judge Muhammad Afzal Majoka heard the case, where both accused, Imaan Mazari and Hadi Ali Chatha, appeared in court.
During the proceedings, their representatives requested the court to postpone the hearing, citing the unavailability of defense lawyers.
The prosecution opposed the request, arguing that the accused were using delay tactics. Prosecutor Usman Rana told the court that the same excuse was made during the previous hearing and urged the court to continue the trial without further delay.
Judge Majoka remarked that if Hadi Ali Chathaâ€™s lawyer failed to appear at the next hearing, the court would appoint a state counsel to represent him. The court was informed that both accused had yet to submit their written responses to the charge sheet.
After hearing the arguments, the judge directed Mazari and Chatha to submit their replies by the next date and adjourned the hearing until October 11.
It is worth mentioning that the case was registered by the National Cyber Crime Investigation Agency against the two over a controversial post on social media.
